description: This file contains utility functions for configuring and mapping architectures in the context of a virtualization or embedded system project. It defines functions to retrieve configuration names based on architecture identifiers and to map architecture identifiers to simplified architecture names.

methods.name: get_oemake_config
methods.description: Returns a configuration name based on the provided architecture identifier using regular expressions.

methods.name: map_xvisor_arch
methods.description: Maps an architecture identifier to a simplified architecture name (e.g., 'x86', 'arm', 'riscv') based on pattern matching.
